front.title: IODEF-extension to support structured cybersecurity information

abstract.t: This document extends the Incident Object Description Exchange Format (IODEF) defined in RFC 5070 [RFC5070] to facilitate enriched cybersecurity information exchange among cybersecurity entities by embedding structured information formatted by the following specifications: CAPEC[TM], CEE[TM], CPE[TM], CVE(R), CVRF, CVSS, CWE[TM], CWSS[TM], OVAL(R), and XCCDF.
